title: Parole Tracking Program
description: Generate a Parole Tracking Program report for a parolee.
output:
[center][size=175]DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS AND REHABILITATION[/size]
[size=165]DIVISION OF ADULT PAROLE OPERATIONS[/size]
[size=160]Parole Tracking Program[/size]

[img]https://mdc.gta.world/img/persons/{{general_info.firstname}}_{{general_info.lastname}}.png[/img]

[/center]

[table2=1,black,transparent,Roboto]
[tr][tdwidth=2,black,transparent,top,center,500,5]
[center][b][size=120]GENERAL INFORMATION[/size][/b][/center]
[/tdwidth][/tr][/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Roboto]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5][b]NAME[/b][/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5][b]PHONE NUMBER[/b][/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5][b]ADDRESS[/b][/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5]{{general_info.firstname}} {{general_info.lastname}}[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5]{{general_info.phone_number}}[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5]{{general_info.address}}[/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Roboto]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,25,5][b]DATE OF BIRTH[/b][/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,25,5][b]GENDER[/b][/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,25,5][b]PLACE OF WORK[/b][/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,25,5][b]KNOWN ALIASES[/b][/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,25,5]{{general_info.date_of_birth}}[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,25,5]{{general_info.gender}}[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,25,5]{{general_info.place_of_work}}[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,25,5]{{general_info.known_aliases}}[/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Roboto]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,100,5][b]RELATIVES[/b][/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,100,5][list]{{#each general_info.relatives}}
[*] {{this.relative}}{{/each}}[/list][/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Roboto]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,60,5][b]CLASSIFICATION[/b][/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,40,5][b]ADDITIONAL CLASSIFICATION NOTES[/b][/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,60,5][cbc][/cbc]{{general_info.classification}}[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,40,5]{{general_info.classification_notes}}[/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[/table2]

[table2=1,black,transparent,Roboto]
[tr][tdwidth=2,black,transparent,top,center,500,5]
[center][b][size=120]GANG AFFILIATION[/size][/b][/center]
[/tdwidth][/tr][/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Roboto]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5][b]MONIKER[/b][/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5][b]GANG[/b][/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5][b]SANGANG PROFILE[/b][/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5]{{gang_affiliation.moniker}}[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5]{{gang_affiliation.gang}}[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5][url={{gang_affiliation.sangang_link}}]ACCESS[/url][/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Roboto]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,25,5][b]ADDITIONAL AFFILIATION NOTES[/b][/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,25,5]{{gang_affiliation.affiliation_notes}}
[/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[/table2]

[table2=1,black,transparent,Roboto]
[tr][tdwidth=2,black,transparent,top,center,500,5]
[center][b][size=120]IMPORTANT INFORMATION[/size][/b][/center]
[/tdwidth][/tr][/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Roboto]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5][b]MDC PROFILE[/b][/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5][b]INMATE PROFILE[/b][/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5][b]PAROLE APPLICATION[/b][/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5][url=https://mdc.gta.world/record/{{general_info.firstname}}_{{general_info.lastname}}]ACCESS[/url][/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5][url=https://mdc.gta.world/sadcr/inmate/{{general_info.firstname}}_{{general_info.lastname}}]ACCESS[/url][/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5][url={{important_info.parole_application_link}}]ACCESS[/url][/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Roboto]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,50,5][b]CASE HANDLER(S)[/b][/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,50,5][b]CASE SUPERVISOR[/b][/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,50,5]{{#each officers}}{{this.rank}} {{this.name}}{{#unless @last}}, {{/unless}}{{/each}}[/tdwidth]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,50,5]{{important_info.case_supervisor}}[/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[/table2]

[table2=1,black,transparent,Roboto]
[tr][tdwidth=2,black,transparent,top,center,500,5]
[center][b][size=120]ADDITIONAL INFORMATION[/size][/b][/center]
[/tdwidth][/tr][/table2]
[table2=1,black,transparent,Roboto]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,100,5][b]ADDITIONAL NOTES[/b][/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[tr]
[tdwidth=1,black,transparent,top,left,33,5]{{additional_notes}}
[/tdwidth]
[/tr]
[/table2]
